publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2887# Tricia Marwick: GM Trials, Newport-That the Parliament welcomes the formation of a steering group to oppose the proposed GM field trial in Newport, Fife; notes the statement made by Mr Charles Saunders, consultant in public health for Fife Health Board and a member of the BMA that the Scottish Executive is gambling with public health, and considers that the Minister for Environment and Rural Development, who is responsible for deciding whether the trials go ahead, should withhold agreement until the seed manufactures can offer conclusive proof that there will be no health or environmental damage from GM Crops.
S1M-2887# GM Trials, Newport (lodged on 12 March 2002) Michael Matheson*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2887# GM Trials, Newport (lodged on 12 March 2002) Bruce Crawford*
